name: 80s street games
description: We welcome you to 80s Street Games, you will play as Gabe Mitchell, a video game developer who lives reselling other games in the 80s, your mission will be to observe buyers and sell them the game that most interests them, if you do not sell them something they like, you will lose, be careful with the police, if they catch you selling a game they will take away all your merchandise and you will lose, good luck seller.
